message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $75 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $75 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I believe $78 would be a fair price for me to pay.
I understand that $78 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $84.
I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $80 for it.
